programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Pregnant Jenna wants a baby-daddy. When KC fails the test, she sets her heart on Sav. He’s cute, capable and caring! The big problem? He’s dating Holly J.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Adam can’t believe it – he and Fiona are actually beginning to connect during Sweetheart Week! He’s willing to turn a blind eye to her drinking if it means they get to hang out – and kiss.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After really messing up at the end of the semester, Drew’s grounded for Spring Break and lonely without girlfriend Bianca. But when he begins to worry that B might be unfaithful, he sneaks out to keep tabs on her. What he discovers is Bianca’s ex is back in town – and he’s dangerous.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After really messing up at the end of the semester, Drew’s grounded for Spring Break and lonely without girlfriend Bianca. But when he begins to worry that B might be unfaithful, he sneaks out to keep tabs on her. What he discovers is Bianca’s ex is back in town – and he’s dangerous.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Degrassi’s back in session and this term high school’s more complicated than ever: Clare can’t believe Eli’s over her. She’s convinced his ‘normal’ behavior is a plot to win her back.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: All Anya wants for her 18th birthday is a kiss from her favourite doctor. But when he tells her he’s off to Africa to help the poor, and she gets rejected from TU (the only school she applied to), she wants to go along. But will he share her enthusiasm?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew is terrified that Vince will come for him and he’s unable to function normally. He pushes away Bianca and when she tries to make it right, she only causes Drew more pain.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Dave and Adam want to co-host an in-school radio show. Dave has concerns because Adam is transgender. When Dave voices his discomfort over the airwaves, the school turns against him.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Dave and Adam want to co-host an in-school radio show. Dave has concerns because Adam is transgender. When Dave voices his discomfort over the airwaves, the school turns against him.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Eli’s got the perfect distraction to get over Clare—writing the school play for director, Fiona. But when writer’s block gets the best of him, Eli realizes his new anti-anxiety meds are to blame.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Eli’s got the perfect distraction to get over Clare—writing the school play for director, Fiona. But when writer’s block gets the best of him, Eli realizes his new anti-anxiety meds are to blame.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After getting rejected by Dr. Chris and Toronto University, Anya’s self-esteem is at an all-time low. Anya needs a boost of confidence and tries to find it through artificial means.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare’s messy breakup with Eli and her parents’ ugly divorce has turned her against relationships. The only problem? All she can think about is making out with new hottie Jake.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare’s messy breakup with Eli and her parents’ ugly divorce has turned her against relationships.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Holly J’s dialysis is not working and her doctor recommends a kidney transplant. When her parents aren’t matches, she learns the truth: she’s adopted.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Holly J’s dialysis is not working and her doctor recommends a kidney transplant. When her parents aren’t matches, she learns the truth: she’s adopted.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jenna wants to be more than just a teen mom and returns to Degrassi and into school activities. Jenna and KC start to realize that the best thing for the baby, and for them, may be to give Tyson up for adoption.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jenna wants to be more than just a teen mom and returns to Degrassi and into school activities. Jenna and KC start to realize that the best thing for the baby, and for them, may be to give Tyson up for adoption.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew’s discovered a way to cope with PTSD: fighting. But when Katie writes an expose on youth violence that inadvertently gets his underground fight club shut down, Drew’s PTSD returns and Drew must find another way to exercise his demons: a garage fighting league.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew’s discovered a way to cope with PTSD: fighting. But when Katie writes an expose on youth violence that inadvertently gets his underground fight club shut down, Drew’s PTSD returns and Drew must find another way to exercise his demons: a garage fighting league.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Eli, still off his meds, is convinced he can win Clare back. His plan? Use the play, and Imogen’s help, to break up Clare and Jake. But when Clare makes it clear that there is no future for her and Eli, Eli’s mania turns to depression.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As Eli stretches the limits of sanity in a bid to get Clare back, someone else is just as willing to push the limits for Eli... Imogen.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Drop It Like It's Hot, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Alli wants to cement her relationship with Dave before leaving for a two month Summer Science Camp. But after a miscommunication about sex, Alli has to make things right.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Drop It Like It's Hot, Pt. 2
programme.desc: Alli wants to cement her relationship with Dave before leaving for a two month Summer Science Camp. But after a miscommunication about sex, Alli has to make things right. She wants to take Dave to a basketball game but she doesn’t have the funds, so she decides to use poker to finance their date.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marisol learns Katie’s dating Marisol’s long time crush Drew, and decides to sabotage Katie’s dream of being elected student council Prez by running against her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marisol learns Katie’s dating Marisol’s long time crush Drew, and decides to sabotage Katie’s dream of being elected student council Prez by running against her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Everyone’s got a date for prom – except Fiona. And she’s moping. A lot. She is so self-absorbed that she disregards the fact that Holly J’s illness won’t allow her to attend.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Drew discovers Bianca's been dating Vince to keep him safe, he becomes obsessed with extracting her from gang life. Drew jeopardizes his rekindled relationship with Katie by setting out to exact revenge on Vince using his ultimate fighting skills.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Jake thinks his feelings for Clare are unrequited, he escapes to his cabin with friends hoping one last summer bash will help him move on.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Unfortunately the popular girls’ clique she so badly wants to be a part of does not include her quirky friend Imogen. When a game of truth or dare turns into a senior prank, how far will Fiona go to secure her place among the popular girls?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Katie is a mixture of nerves and excitement as the moment she has trained for is here. She’s trying out for the National soccer team. But Katie’s dreams come crashing down when an injured knee threatens to destroy everything.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Not Ready To Make Nice, Pt. 1

programme.sub-title: Not Ready To Make Nice, Pt. 2

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Since receiving his bipolar diagnosis, Eli is tired of being treated differently. Teachers are giving him extensions, Bullfrog is being over-protective…even Imogen is making him into a bipolar art project.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Dave is determined to spend time with Alli and win back her trust. Just as he’s beginning to make headway, Dave’s one night stand, Jacinta, aggressively pushes her way back into his life, making it impossible for Dave to ignore her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Dave is determined to spend time with Alli and win back her trust. Just as he’s beginning to make headway, Dave’s one night stand, Jacinta, aggressively pushes her way back into his life, making it impossible for Dave to ignore her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Bianca is stoked when Katie agrees to help her with her university applications…until she suspects her new “friend” is using her to source painkillers. As Katie’s downward spiral continues, Bianca and Drew become closer.
